ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: Great Idea on the pulling message!  I am gonna implement this for myself tonight.  How about: /g Charming %t -- do not waste your mana on it! /stopsong /pause
ygData.messageBody:
Great Idea on the pulling message! I am gonna implement this for myself
tonight. How about:

/g Charming %t -- do not waste your mana on it!
/stopsong
/pause 30, /cast 1 (or the number spell where Charm is memmed)

and

/g There is a %t close by (while standing at the camp spot)

Lago Bardoon, 35th lvl Bard of Bertox, Defenders of Aleria

snip

> That "screen shiver" was pretty wild, but it does seem that another press
> of the hot key does start the whole sequence over again. However, for
> pulls
> and healing I love the %t command. Nothing was sweeter than our puller
> saying "/g inc %t", and having our enchanter say "/g Mezzing %t" and me
> saying "/g Healing %t".
>
> I convinced my enchanter friend that these are very handy and he loves
> them. The "pause" command didn't really work well for me with a caster,
> but
> I'm sure that just needs to be refined.
>
> ---Windleaf.
>
>
